data.enText: a woman whose husband has died and who has not married again

data.chText: 使丧偶；使成为寡妇（或鳏夫）
data.enText: if sb is widowed , their husband or wife has died
She was widowed when she was 35.

tr: a woman whose husband is dead especially one who has not remarried
cause to be without a spouse
example: The war widowed many women in the former Yugoslavia

value.def: A widow is a woman whose husband has died and who has not married again.

trans: 黑寡妇毒蛛(美洲蜘蛛，雌蛛常吃掉雄蛛)
